title: Accounting App: Initial Concept
summary: Brainstorming a Duolingo-style app to make learning accounting fun and accessible.
html:
Idea

Learning accounting can be intimidating and boring. I wanted to create an app that makes it engaging and fun, similar to how Duolingo teaches languages.

Approach

Using gamification, bite-sized lessons, and interactive exercises to teach accounting fundamentals.

Notes

  • Focus on core accounting principles.
  • Keep lessons short and engaging.
  • Include real-world examples.

title: Accounting App: UI Design & Flow
summary: Designed the user interface and lesson flow for the accounting learning experience.
html:
Overview

Created a clean, intuitive interface that guides users through accounting concepts progressively.

Process

Designed in Figma first, focusing on simplicity and clarity. Used familiar patterns from educational apps to reduce learning curve.

Features

  • Progress tracking dashboard.
  • Interactive quizzes and exercises.
  • Achievement system for motivation.

title: Accounting App: Development Progress
summary: Building the core functionality using Swift and UIKit, implementing the lesson system.
html:
Development

Started implementing the app in Swift using UIKit. Built the lesson progression system and quiz functionality.

Challenges

Balancing educational content with engaging interactions. Making complex accounting concepts simple enough for beginners.

Next Steps

  • Add more lesson content.
  • Implement user authentication.
  • Create progress tracking backend.
